revision.comment: Bot: Removing [[Commons:File:Aa piratini-600x400.jpg]] ([[:File:Aa piratini-600x400.jpg|en]]). It was deleted on Commons by [[:Commons:User:~riley|~riley]] (per [[Commons:Commons:Deletion requests/Files uploaded by NAMmc2]]).
revision.text:
{{Infobox settlement |name = Piratini |settlement_type = [[Municipalities of Brazil|Municipality]] |official_name = |nickname = |motto = |image_skyline = Igreja Matriz Nossa Senhora da Conceição de Piratini.jpg |imagesize = |image_caption = Catholic Church |image_flag = |image_seal = Piratini-Brasão.jpg |pushpin_map=Brazil |pushpin_map_size=250 |pushpin_map_caption=Location in Brazil |subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[States of Brazil|State]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Mesoregions of Brazil|Mesoregion]] |subdivision_type3 = [[Microregions of Brazil|Microregion]] |subdivision_name = {{flag|Brazil}} |subdivision_name1 = [[Rio Grande do Sul]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Sudoeste Rio-grandense]] |subdivision_name3 = [[Serras de Sudeste]] |leader_title = Mayor |leader_name = Vilso Agnelo da Silva Gomes |established_title = Founded |established_date = 6 July 1789 |area_footnotes = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 3561,480 |area_total_sq_mi = |area_land_km2 = |area_land_sq_mi = |area_water_km2 = |area_water_sq_mi = |population_footnotes = |population_as_of = 2010 |population_total = 19831 |population_demonym= Piratinenses |population_density_km2 = auto |population_density_sq_mi = |timezone = [[UTC|UTC-3]] |utc_offset = -3 |timezone_DST = [[UTC|UTC-2]] |utc_offset_DST = -2 |coordinates = {{coord|31|26|52|S|53|06|14|W|region:BR|display=inline}} |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 349 |elevation_ft = |footnotes = }}'''Piratini''' is a city in the [[Brazil]]ian state of [[Rio Grande do Sul]] with a population of some 19,000.[http://www.ibge.gov.br/cidadesat/ IBGE - Cidades@] It is the former capital of the short-lived [[Riograndense Republic]] which was proclaimed on September 11, 1836. ==References== {{reflist}}
{{Municipalities of Rio Grande do Sul}} [[Category:Municipalities in Rio Grande do Sul]] [[Category:Capitals of former nations]] {{RioGrandedoSul-geo-stub}}
